attributes.action: act to improve the condition of roads in the UK
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Whilst Mr Blair and Mr Brown seem to delight in using the average British motorist as a cash cow, the state of roads in the country seems to be deteriorating daily. Indeed, it has reached a point now where potholes, loose gravel, and even subsidence have made many roads dangerous, especially for motorcyclists. It is time that most, if not all tax raised from motorists was spent providing a roads infrastructure that a "world leader" such as the UK deserves.
